name: AddTaskDependencies
description:
Add dependencies to an Asana task.

Marks specified tasks as dependencies for a given task in Asana, ensuring they aren't already marked. Suitable for managing task workflows where completion order is essential.

parameters.name: task_id_to_modify
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task to which dependencies will be added.

parameters.name: task_dependency_ids
parameters.description: An array of task GIDs that the current task depends on. These are required to establish dependencies between tasks in Asana.

value_schema.description: An array of task gids that a task depends on.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty formatting for the response output. Provides improved readability with line breaking and indentation, recommended for debugging only.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
